features: IN SHOWER LOTION - Nourishing in shower moisturizer works when skin is most receptive to moisture for luxuriously soft skin that feels renewed and hydrated.
LUXURIOUS SKIN RENEWAL - Works when skin is most receptive to moisture for luxuriously soft skin that feels renewed.
SHEA OIL DERIVED FROM PURE, AFRICAN SHEA BUTTER - Infused with Shea Butter Oil, this formulas works to restore skin by helping it hold moisture for an enhanced sheen and luminosity.
JUST-SHOWERED SKIN BEST ABSORBS MOISTURE - After showering, your pores are open, providing an easy pathway for moisture to absorb into skin.
SKIN'S PEAK MOISTURE MOMENT - Absorbs into the skin's surface bringing nourishment and moisturization to the source of dryness.
body.description: Get perfectly hydrated skin without the heavy lotion feel. Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Enriching Shea Oil locks in hydration at skin’s peak moisture moment - when you’re in the shower. Use this enriching moisturizer after showering and enjoy luxuriously soft skin. In shower lotion for dry and extra dry skin is formulated to soothe and refresh tired, rough skin. Shea Butter infused moisturizer locks in hydration and smooths skin. Non-sticky formula goes on smooth for enhanced sheen and luminosity. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get perfectly hydrated skin without the heavy lotion feel. Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Nourishing Coconut Oil locks in hydration at skin’s peak moisture moment - when you’re in the shower. Use this enriching moisturizer after showering and enjoy luxuriously soft skin. In shower lotion for dry and extra dry skin is formulated to soothe and refresh tired, rough skin. Coconut Oil lotion features a gentle scent and long lasting hydration. Non-sticky formula by Kao USA goes on smooth for enhanced sheen and luminosity. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is very moisturizing. It’s also very convenient for when I’m in a hurry or just don’t feel like putting on lotion after my shower. As an African American woman, it leaves a glow on my skin and makes it very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin, VERY , dry skin. I have used Kiehls, loccitane, vaseline, shea moisture, nivea, amlactin, cerave, oil in the shower, oil out the shower the list goes on and on and on with the variations I have tried. I ended up making my own lotion because nothing would leave my skin moisturized from sun up to sun down. But this stuff right here, it is AMAZING. I am moisturized, soft, and supple all day long. I do not even have to layer moisturizers, I can use this all on it's own and my skin is *chef's kiss*. I take my shower and while I am still wet, I slather it all over my body. I get out the shower still pretty wet, do my skincare, brush my teeth and when all that is done I rub it in and I am GLOWING! I may look ridiculous standing naked in the bathroom airdrying my lotion but it is 100% worth it. I will say, how I use it only has it only lasting about 2 weeks for me so I end up going through 2-3 bottles a month, it is my 7 year old daughter's favorite lotion too. But $30 a month compared to what I have spent in comparison to other creams is just fine. I will be using this forever, as long ad they make it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Applies easily after shower and has a light feel and scent. Moisturizes well in our very arid climate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it! Applied fresh out the shower before drying off, it left my skin smelling and looking good! My skin felt Silky Smooth, Soft and Moisturized!! I was impressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is an easy product to use after a shower or bath. Smooth it on wet skin, wipe the excess off. Leaves your skin extra soft , even for winter dry skin. Smells nice, not too strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best product you’re not using…
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on a whim after seeing it featured in an article and must say I love it! My legs aren’t dry and ashy and feel so smooth. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t go without!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing! It hydrates my skin and makes my skin look so nice. Skin is so soft. This item is a MUST for me

Love this product but is super expensive and hard to get in Canada. Wish it was available with all the different varieties and scents. This product is super for dry skin in winter. Does wonders for my skin - no more dry chapped hands, feet, elbows and arms and legs. Skin feels super soft and smooth. Can’t say enough good things about the quality of this product.
